scripts.build: sass spec/index.spec.scss dist/index.css && sass spec/index.spec.scss dist/index.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "New patch version" && npm publish && git push -u
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "New minor version" && npm publish && git push -u
scripts.major: npm version major -m "New major version" && npm publish && git push -u
